title._content: [John W. Anthony of Company B, 11th Virginia Infantry Regiment, Southern Guards] (LOC)

description._content: [John W. Anthony of Company B, 11th Virginia Infantry Regiment, Southern Guards] 1862 April 27. 1 photograph : ninth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 7.6 x 6.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 1-146. Other material related to John W. Anthony processed as LOT 14043-3, no. 19: letter from John W. Anthony to Ma, Pa & Callie, June 2, 1862. Additional information in collections file. Photograph shows identified soldier, John W. Anthony, who enlisted in Company !, 2nd Virginia Cavalry Regiment, and then in Company B, 11th Virginia Infantry Regiment, as a private and was later promoted to sergeant. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (DLC/PP-2011:094). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: Anthony, John W.,--1843-1920. Confederate States of America.--Army.--Virginia Infantry Regiment, 11th--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.31548 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2715
